metadata.title: CVE-2016-10728 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Suricata before 3.1.2. If an ICMPv4 error packetis received as the first packet on a flow in the to_client direction, itconfuses the rule grouping lookup logic. The toclient inspection will thencontinue with the wrong rule group. This can lead to missed detection.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
